changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO coy_sec_realm ( id, description ) SELECT id, CONCAT('The ', name, ' realm') FROM coy_realm WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM coy_sec_realm)
INSERT INTO coy_sec_user ( id, user_state, description ) SELECT id, 'ACTIVE', CONCAT('The ', name, ' user') FROM coy_user WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM coy_sec_user)

INSERT INTO coy_sec_role ( id, entity_state, owner_role, realm_id, created_when, created_by, name, description ) VALUES ( '${SYSTEM_ROLE_ID}', 'ACTIVE', 'SYSTEM', '${SYSTEM_REALM_ID}', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '${SYSTEM_USER_ID}', '${SYSTEM_ROLE_NAME}', 'The ${SYSTEM_ROLE_NAME} role' )

INSERT INTO coy_sec_group ( id, entity_state, owner_role, realm_id, created_when, created_by, name, description ) VALUES ( '${SYSTEM_GROUP_ID}', 'ACTIVE', 'SYSTEM', '${SYSTEM_REALM_ID}', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '${SYSTEM_USER_ID}', '${SYSTEM_GROUP_NAME}', 'The ${SYSTEM_GROUP_NAME} group' )

INSERT INTO coy_sec_group_role ( entity_state, owner_role, realm_id, created_when, created_by, group_id, role_id ) VALUES ( 'ACTIVE', 'SYSTEM', '${SYSTEM_REALM_ID}', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '${SYSTEM_USER_ID}', '${SYSTEM_GROUP_ID}', '${SYSTEM_ROLE_ID}' )

INSERT INTO coy_sec_user_group ( entity_state, owner_role, realm_id, created_when, created_by, user_id, group_id ) VALUES ( 'ACTIVE', 'SYSTEM', '${SYSTEM_REALM_ID}', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '${SYSTEM_USER_ID}', '${SYSTEM_USER_ID}', '${SYSTEM_GROUP_ID}' )
